title: PBE forums having problems?
body: Hi, I have a PBE account, I'm actually in a game that wouldn't load so I went to ask about it on the forums. the strange thing is, I couldn't login to the forums using the exact details I was using to log into the client. Is there some work being done there?

replies.body: I haven't had issues getting signed in myself, but I *am* starting to see more of this topic popping up today. Let's try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) to see if that helps, and if not go ahead and try using a different browser for me as well if you can. Let me know if that's not helping and I'll reach out to see if something might not be working correctly on the backend.
I have the same issue, can log in on the pbe client and play games and all that, but on pbe boards i can't login
